title: Create a Recruiting Dashboard
description: The VP of HR wants a dashboard to track key recruiting metrics like time-to-fill, cost-per-hire, and open requisitions.

tasks.description: Identify the key metrics to be included in the dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The HR analyst confirms the list of required metrics.

tasks.description: Connect a data visualization tool (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) to the ATS and HRIS databases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst establishes the data connections needed for the dashboard.

tasks.description: Build the dashboard with visualizations for each key metric.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a dashboard with several charts and graphs that automatically update.
